law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 ch. 183, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Legislative intent of KRS 158.605 to 158.620 and 157.360.
